aber.dcs.cs22510.clg11.util

Class LoadData

  • java.lang.Object
    • aber.dcs.cs22510.clg11.util.LoadData

  • public class LoadData
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for loading crucial, preliminary data files into the system using a textual interface before the GUI is loaded.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoadData(Datastore comp)
      Constructor to instantiate a new LoadData.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadCourses(java.lang.String[] courseData)
      Parses the data read-in from the "courses.txt" file and creates a new Course object populated with the read-in characteristics.
      void loadEntrants(java.lang.String[] entrantData)
      Parses the data read-in from the "entrants.txt" file and creates a new Entrant object populated with the read-in characteristics.
      void loadFiles(Datatype type, java.lang.String fileName)
      Prompts user for the file path of a specified file before attempting to load the data into it's respective data collection.
      void loadNodes(java.lang.String[] nodeData)
      Parses the data read-in from the "nodes.txt" file and creates a new Node object populated with the read-in characteristics.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoadData

        public LoadData(Datastore comp)
        Constructor to instantiate a new LoadData. Takes the shared data store object created in CMDriver as a parameter to allow accessed to the lists of nodes/entrants/courses loaded in.
        Parameters:
        comp - Shared Datastore object created within CMDriver.

    • Method Detail

      • loadFiles

        public void loadFiles(Datatype type,
             java.lang.String fileName)
        Prompts user for the file path of a specified file before attempting to load the data into it's respective data collection.
        Parameters:
        type - ENUM denoting the type of data file (Node, Course or Entrant).
        fileName - The path of the file to be loaded.

      • loadCourses

        public void loadCourses(java.lang.String[] courseData)
        Parses the data read-in from the "courses.txt" file and creates a new Course object populated with the read-in characteristics. This new Course object is then added to the internal collection of Courses.
        Parameters:
        courseData - Collection of all course characteristics data read in from "courses.txt".

      • loadNodes

        public void loadNodes(java.lang.String[] nodeData)
        Parses the data read-in from the "nodes.txt" file and creates a new Node object populated with the read-in characteristics. This new Node object is then added to the internal collection of Nodes.
        Parameters:
        nodeData - Collection of all node characteristics data read in from "nodes.txt".

      • loadEntrants

        public void loadEntrants(java.lang.String[] entrantData)
        Parses the data read-in from the "entrants.txt" file and creates a new Entrant object populated with the read-in characteristics. This new Entrant object is then added to the internal collection of Entrants.
        Parameters:
        entrantData - Collection of all node characteristics data read in from "nodes.txt".
